00037 #define TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE "../data/test.file.data_dat"

00039 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetTest_FStream );

00041 DataSetTest_FStream::DataSetTest_FStream()
00042 {
00043         data = 0;
00044         dataPlane = 0;
00045 }

00052 void DataSetTest_FStream::setUp()
00053 {
00054         data = new GenericData;
00055         GenericFileReader reader;
00056         std::string name = TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE;
00057         reader.SetFilename(name);
00058         reader.ReadHeader(*data);
00059         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00060         data->Header().GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd);
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin != dchEnd);
00062         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00063         dchBegin->GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin, dphEnd);
00064         Fs::aptOpen(ifs, name, std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00065         dataPlane = new DataSet(data->Header().GetFilename(), *dphBegin, ifs);
00066 }
00067 
00068 void DataSetTest_FStream::tearDown()
00069 {
00070         ifs.close();
00071         if (dataPlane)
00072                 dataPlane->Delete();
00073         delete data;
00074 }

00076 void DataSetTest_FStream::testCreation()
00077 {
00078         DataSetHeader header;
00079         DataSet* dc = new DataSet(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE, header,ifs);
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dc != 0);
00081         dc->Delete();
00082 }

00085 {

00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dc != 0);
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dc->Delete());

00127 void DataSetTest_FStream::testproperty_Header()
00128 {
00129         // Get the DataSetHeader
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00131         const DataSetHeader& header = dataPlane->Header();
00132 
00133         // Get the DataSetHeader from the FileHeader to check against
00134         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00135         data->Header().GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd);
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin != dchEnd);
00137         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00138         dchBegin->GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin, dphEnd);
00139 
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetName() == dphBegin->GetName());
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetDataSize() == dphBegin->GetDataSize());
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetRowSize() == dphBegin->GetRowSize());
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetNameValParamCnt() == dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt());
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetColumnInfo(0) == dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0));
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetColumnCnt() == dphBegin->GetColumnCnt());
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetRowCnt() == dphBegin->GetRowCnt());
00147 }

00149 void DataSetTest_FStream::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Single()
00150 {
00151         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00152 
00153         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00154         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00155         {
00156                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00157                 u_int16_t value;
00158                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00159                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00160         }
00161 
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00163 }

00166 {
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00168

00170         Uint16Vector values;
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(0, 0, rows, values));

00174         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )

00176                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00177                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row] == expected);
00178         }
00179 
00180         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());

00202 void DataSetTest_FStream::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Vector_InChunks()
00203 {
00204         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00205 
00206         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00207         int32_t chunks = 7;
00208         int32_t rowsPerChunk = rows/chunks;
00209 
00210         for (int32_t chunk = 0; chunk < chunks; ++chunk)
00211         {
00212                 int32_t startRow = chunk*rowsPerChunk;
00213                 Uint16Vector values;
00214                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(0, startRow, rowsPerChunk, values));
00215 
00216                 int32_t rowsInVector = rowsPerChunk;
00217                 if (dataPlane->Rows() < startRow+rowsPerChunk)
00218                         rowsInVector = dataPlane->Rows() - startRow;
00219 
00220                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values.size() == rowsInVector);
00221 
00222                 // Check the values
00223                 for( int32_t row = startRow; row < rowsInVector+startRow; ++row )
00224                 {
00225                         u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00226                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row-startRow] == expected);
00227                 }
00228         }
00229 
00230         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00231 }
00232 
00233 void DataSetTest_FStream::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw()
00234 {
00235         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00236 
00237         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00238         u_int16_t* values = new u_int16_t[rows];
00239         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetDataRaw(0, 0, rows, values));
00240 
00241         // Check the values
00242         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00243         {
00244                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00245                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row] == expected);
00246         }
00247 
00248         delete [] values;
00249 
00250         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00251 }

00253 void DataSetTest_FStream::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw_TooManyRows()
00254 {
00255         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00256 
00257         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00258         u_int16_t* values = new u_int16_t[rows*2];
00259         u_int32_t rowsRead = 0;
00260         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(rowsRead = dataPlane->GetDataRaw(0, 0, rows*2, values));
00261         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(rowsRead == rows);
00262 
00263         // Check the values
00264         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00265         {
00266                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00267                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row] == expected);
00268         }
00269 
00270         delete [] values;
00271 
00272         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00273 }

00275 void DataSetTest_FStream::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw_InChunks()
00276 {
00277         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00278 
00279         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00280         int32_t chunks = 7;
00281         int32_t rowsPerChunk = rows/chunks;
00282 
00283         for (int32_t chunk = 0; chunk < chunks; ++chunk)
00284         {
00285                 int32_t startRow = chunk*rowsPerChunk;
00286                 u_int16_t* values = new u_int16_t[rows*2];
00287                 u_int32_t rowsRead = 0;
00288                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(rowsRead = dataPlane->GetDataRaw(0, startRow, rowsPerChunk, values));
00289 
00290                 int32_t rowsInArray = rowsPerChunk;
00291                 if (dataPlane->Rows() < startRow+rowsPerChunk)
00292                         rowsInArray = dataPlane->Rows() - startRow;
00293 
00294                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(rowsRead == rowsInArray);
00295 
00296                 // Check the values
00297                 for( int32_t row = startRow; row < rowsInArray+startRow; ++row )
00298                 {
00299                         u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00300                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row-startRow] == expected);
00301                 }
00302 
00303                 delete [] values;
00304         }
00305 
00306         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00307 }
